TextLibrary.Text: Hey, kid, we've got that dirtbag, Tarn, on the line again.
Hey, kid, we've got that dirtbag, Tarn, on the line again.
It doesn't matter. We need to talk.
It doesn't matter. We need to talk.
No. You need to talk. I need to run.
No. You need to talk. I need to run.

You are more correct than you realize. Right now, a fleet of MRI ships is bearing down on your position; we've been following them. Hiding in the Krystallus System was inspiring. It will take them some time to locate you in the debris. They will find you eventually though.

You are more correct than you realize. Right now, a fleet of MRI ships is bearing down on your position; we've been following them. Hiding in the Krystallus System was inspiring. It will take them some time to locate you in the debris. They will find you eventually though.
We are on Krystallus Delta. Join us. We'll be waiting here when you decide to stand and fight. General Tarn out.
We are on Krystallus Delta. Join us. We'll be waiting here when you decide to stand and fight. General Tarn out.
